text: mahapolove niyojitayin bavata numbala va pat kale ohumaya. tavada ohu numbalata dun dæ hi numbala va pariksavata lak karanu pinisa numbalagen ætæmeku va ætæmekuta vada taratiram valin usas kaleya.(nabivaraya) nisækavama obe paramadhipatiyanan danduvam dimedi ita tivraya. tavada sæbævinma ohu ati ksamasiliya. karuna gunayen yuktaya
